anya-e0803n12:201_2: Atrime payogā – ubho kumārā nikkītā. Ubho itthiyo tiṭṭhanti, ubho cittāni tiṭṭhanti, ubho putte adāsi. Ubho kaññāyo passati. Ubho pādāni bhinditvā, saññamissāmi vo ahaṁ. anya-e0803n12:203_0: Dve, dve, dvīhi, dvībhi, dvinnaṁ, duvinnaṁ, dvīhi, dvībhi, dvinnaṁ, duvinnaṁ, dvīsu.

anya-e0803n12:204_0: ‘‘Dve’’ti rūpaṁ dvisaddassa, yaṁ samāsamhi taṁ bhave;
anya-e0803n12:208_0: Tayo , tayo, tīhi, tībhi, tiṇṇaṁ, tiṇṇannaṁ, tīhi, tībhi, tiṇṇaṁ, tiṇṇannaṁ, tīsu. Imāni pulliṅgarūpāni.

anya-e0803n12:210_2: ‘‘Tiṇṇannaṁ kho bhikkhave indriyānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā piṇḍolabhāradvājena bhikkhunā aññā byākatā’’ti idaṁ ‘‘tiṇṇanna’’nti padassa atthibhāve nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:213_0: Yasmā tissa samāsamhi, saddhiṁ parapadena ve;

anya-e0803n12:218_1: Itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne ‘‘catunna’’nti padaṁ cūḷaniruttiyaṁ niruttipiṭake pāḷiyaṁ aṭṭhakathāsu ca dassanato vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:218_4: Pāḷiyaṁ pana soṇadantasuttādīsu ‘‘samaṇo gotamo catunnaṁ parisānaṁ piyo manāpo’’ti āgataṁ.
anya-e0803n12:218_5: Aṭṭhakathāsu ca pana suttantaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘catūhi acchariyabbhutadhammehi samannāgato catunnaṁ parisānaṁ piyo manāpo’’ti āgataṁ.
anya-e0803n12:218_6: Sattilaṅghajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘ācariyo panassa catunnaṁ sattīnaṁ laṅghanaṁ sippaṁ jānātī’’ti āgataṁ.
anya-e0803n12:219_0: Cattāri, cattāri, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, catunnaṁ, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, catunnaṁ, catūsu. Imāni napuṁsakaliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n12:224_0: Imāni dveādikāni sabbanāmikāni bahuvacanāniyeva bhavanti, na ekavacanāni.
anya-e0803n12:225_0: Idāni tumhaamhasaddānaṁ nāmikapadamālā vuccante, tesu yena katheti,
anya-e0803n12:226_0: Tvaṁ, tuvaṁ, tumhe. Taṁ, tuvaṁ, tvaṁ, tavaṁ, tumhe. Tayā, tvayā, tumhehi, tumhebhi. Tuyhaṁ, tava, tumhaṁ, tumhākaṁ. Tayā, tvayā, tumhehi, tumhebhi. Tuyhaṁ, tava, tumhaṁ, tumhākaṁ. Tayi, tvayi, tumhesu . Tatra ‘‘tvaṁ puriso, tvaṁ itthī,
anya-e0803n12:228_0: Ahaṁ, ahakaṁ, mayaṁ, amhe. Maṁ, mamaṁ, amhe. Mayā, amhehi, amhebhi. Mayhaṁ, mama, amhaṁ, amhākaṁ, asmākaṁ. Mayā, amhehi, amhebhi. Mayhaṁ, mama, amhaṁ, amhākaṁ, asmākaṁ. Mayi, amhesu, asmesu.
anya-e0803n12:229_0: Ettha pana ‘‘kathaṁ amhe karomase’’ti pāḷidassanato ‘‘tumhe’’ti paccattavacanassa viya ‘‘amhe’’ti paccattavacanassapi atthitā veditabbā,
anya-e0803n12:229_2: Tassa atthibhāve ‘‘ahakañca cittavasānugā bhāsissa’’nti esā pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:229_3: Ettha hi ahakanti ahaṁ iccevattho. Tatra ‘‘ahaṁ puriso, ahaṁ kaññā,
anya-e0803n12:230_0: Kaccāyanacūḷaniruttiniruttipiṭakesu pana ‘‘tumhākaṁ amhāka’’nti ca dutiyābahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:230_4: cūḷaniruttiniruttipiṭake pana ‘‘tumhaṁ amha’’nti ca dutiyekavacanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:230_6: Etāni upaparikkhitvā sāṭṭhakathesu suttantesu dissanti ce, gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:231_0: Tumhaamhasaddānaṁ pana parapadehi saddhiṁ samāse ‘‘maṁdīpā’’tiādayo payogā tathāgatādimukhato sambhavanti.
anya-e0803n12:231_1: ‘‘Ete gāmaṇi maṁdīpā maṁleṇā maṁsaraṇā’’ti hi tathāgatamukhato,
anya-e0803n12:231_4: tulyaṁ nāññena kenacī’’ti ca ‘‘candena tvaṁmukhaṁ tulya’’nti ca kavimukhato.
anya-e0803n12:232_0: Tattha hi ahaṁ dīpo etesanti maṁdīpā, ahaṁ leṇaṁ etesanti maṁleṇā, evaṁ maṁsaraṇā. Tumhena yogo tayyogo, tumhasaddena yogo iccevattho. Amhena yogo mayyogo, amhasaddena yogo iccevattho. Tava mukhaṁ tvaṁmukhaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:232_2: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘maṁdīpā’’iccādidassanato ‘‘tvaṁdīpā’’tiādīni kābyādāse ca ‘‘tvaṁmukha’’nti dassanato tvaṁvaṇṇo, tvaṁsaro, maṁmukhaṁ, maṁvaṇṇo, maṁsaroādīni gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:232_4: tumhe vā dīpā etesanti tvaṁdīpā, tava vaṇṇo tvaṁvaṇṇo. Mama mukhaṁ maṁmukhaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:235_0: Etthāha ‘‘kiṁ ettakameva tumhaamhasaddānaṁ rūpaṁ, udāhu aññampi atthī’’ti? Atthi ‘‘te me’’ iccādīni.
anya-e0803n12:235_1: Yadi evaṁ kasmā padamālā visuṁ na vuttāti? Avacane kāraṇamatthi. Atridaṁ kāraṇaṁ –
anya-e0803n12:236_0: ‘‘Te me vo no’’ti rūpāni, parāni padato yato;
anya-e0803n12:237_0: Tato nāmikapantīsu, na tu vuttāni tāni me.
anya-e0803n12:238_0: Ettha ca mayaṁ me vo nosaddānamatthuddhāro vuccate – tesaddassa pana vuttova.
anya-e0803n12:238_2: mayāsaddaṭṭhānepi ca mayaṁsaddo icceva vadanti, tasmā mayampi tatheva vadāma.
anya-e0803n12:238_7: Bāhirena paccayena vinā manasāva nibbattāti manomayā.
anya-e0803n12:238_10: ‘‘Pīṭhaṁ te sovaṇṇamayaṁ uḷāra’’nti ettha vikāratthe padapūraṇamatte vā daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n12:238_12: tadā suvaṇṇassa vikāro sovaṇṇamayanti vikāratthe mayasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n12:238_14: Yadā pana suvaṇṇena nibbattaṁ sovaṇṇanti ayamattho,
anya-e0803n12:238_15: tadā sovaṇṇameva sovaṇṇamayanti padapūraṇamatte mayasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n12:239_1: halaṁ dāni pakāsitu’’ntiādīsu karaṇe āgato. Mayāti attho.
anya-e0803n12:239_2: ‘‘Tassa me bhante bhagavā saṁkhittena dhammaṁ desetū’’tiādīsu sampadāne, mayhanti atthoti vadanti.
anya-e0803n12:239_3: ‘‘Pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato’’tiādīsu sāmiatthe, mamāti atthoti ca vadanti. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n12:240_0: Karaṇe sampadāne ca, sāmiatthe ca āgato;
anya-e0803n12:242_0: Ettha pana ṭhatvā aṭṭhakathācariyehi kate te mesaddānamatthavivaraṇe vinicchayaṁ brūma tesamadhippāyappakāsanavasena sotūnaṁ saṁsayasamugghāṭanatthaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:242_1: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā temesaddānaṁ sampadānatthavasena ‘‘tuyhaṁ mayha’’nti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇesuṁ,
anya-e0803n12:242_3: Evaṁ yvāyaṁ tehi asaṅkarato niyamo dassito,
anya-e0803n12:242_4: so sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā.
anya-e0803n12:242_5: Tathā hi temesaddatthavācakā tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddā tava mamasaddā ca sampadānasāmiatthesu aniyamato pavattanti.
anya-e0803n12:243_0: Tatrime payogā – idaṁ tuyhaṁ dadāmi. Tuyhaṁ vikappemi. Tuyhaṁ maṁsena medena, matthakena ca brāhmaṇa, āhutiṁ paggahessāmi. Esa hi tuyhaṁ pitā narasīho. Tuyhaṁ pana mātā kahanti. Mayhameva dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, na aññesaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:243_1: mayhameva sāvakānaṁ dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, na aññesaṁ. Na mayhaṁ bhariyā esā. Assamo sukato mayhaṁ. Sabbaññutaṁ piyaṁ mayhaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:243_2: Tāta mayhaṁ mātu mukhaṁ aññādisaṁ, tumhākaṁ aññādisaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:243_3: Mayhaṁ sāmiko idāni marissati. Tava dīyate, tava silāghate, mama silāghate, pabbajjā mama ruccati. Tava putto.
anya-e0803n12:243_4: Ubho mātāpitā mamāti evaṁ aniyamato pavattanti.
anya-e0803n12:244_0: Cūḷaniruttiyañhi yamakamahātherena catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ anaññarūpattaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ sabbattha anaññaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:244_3: Namo te buddha vīratthū’tiādīsu tuyhaṁsaddassa vasena sampadāne, tuyhanti hi attho.
anya-e0803n12:244_5: tavāti hi attho’’tiādīni vadantā ‘‘ayuttaṁ saṁvaṇṇanaṁ saṁvaṇṇesu’’ntipi,
anya-e0803n12:244_6: ‘‘passitabbaṁ na passiṁsū’’tipi āpajjantīti? Yuttaṁyeva te saṁvaṇṇayiṁsu, passitabbañca passiṁsu.
anya-e0803n12:244_7: Tathā hi te ‘‘saddasatthampi ekadesato sāsanānukūlaṁ hotī’’ti paresamanukampāya saddasatthato nayaṁ gahetvā sampadānatthavasena te mesaddānaṁ ‘‘tuyhaṁ mayha’’nti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇayiṁsu,
anya-e0803n12:244_9: Saddasatthe hi catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni sabbathā visadisāni, sāsane pana sadisāni.
anya-e0803n12:244_10: Tasmā sāsane sāmaññena pavattāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni saddasatthe visesena pavattehi catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpehi samānagatikāni katvā paresamanukampāya sampadānatthe tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddānaṁ pavattiniyamo,
anya-e0803n12:244_11: sāmiatthe ca tava mamasaddānaṁ pavattiniyamo dassito.
anya-e0803n12:244_12: Yasmā pana paresamanukampāya ayaṁ niyamo, tasmā karuṇāyevāyaṁparādho, na aṭṭhakathācariyānaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:244_13: Tāya eva hi tehi evaṁ saṁvaṇṇanā katāti.
anya-e0803n12:245_0: Keci panettha evaṁ vadeyyuṁ – nanu ca bho aṭṭhakathācariyehi saddanayaṁ nissāya te mesaddānaṁ sāmiatthe vattamānānaṁ ‘‘tava mamā’’ti atthavacanena ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena medena,
anya-e0803n12:245_1: na mayhaṁ bhariyā esā’’tiādīsu sāmivisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā vattuṁ,
anya-e0803n12:245_2: tathā saddanayaññeva nissāya te mesaddānaṁ sampadānatthe vattamānānaṁ ‘‘tuyhaṁ mayha’’nti atthavacanena ‘‘bhattaṁ tava na ruccati.
anya-e0803n12:245_3: Pabbajjā mama ruccatī’’tiādīsupi sampadānavisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā vattunti? Na sakkā,
anya-e0803n12:245_4: gāthāsu viya cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhānepi tuyhaṁ mayhaṁ tava mamasaddānaṁ aniyamena dvīsu atthesu pavattanato.
anya-e0803n12:245_5: Na hi īdise ṭhāne gāthāyaṁ vā cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhāne vā vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo. ‘‘Tassa rajjassahaṁ bhīto.
anya-e0803n12:245_6: Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmī’’tiādīsuyeva pana ṭhānesu icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n12:246_0: Yadi saddanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena medenā’’tiādīsu vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo siyā,
anya-e0803n12:246_2: Brāhmaṇassa pitā adāsī’’tiādīsupi saddanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘brāhmaṇāyā’’tiādinā vibhattivipallāsattho vacanīyo siyā catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpānaṁ satthe visuṁ vacanato. Evañca sati ko dosoti ce? Attheva doso,
anya-e0803n12:246_3: yasmā dānayoge vā namoyoge vā āyādesasahitāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane nupalabbhanti,
anya-e0803n12:246_4: tasmā ‘‘brāhmaṇāyā’’tiādinā vibhattivipallāsatthavacane ayaṁ doso yadidaṁ avijjamānaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:246_5: Yasmā pana īdisesu ṭhānesu vibhattivipallāsakaraṇaṁ sāvajjaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:246_6: tasmā ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena medenā’’tiādīsupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n12:247_1: purisassa dhanaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ adāsi, brāhmaṇānaṁ santaka’’nti.
anya-e0803n12:247_2: Tathā hi pāvacane sa naṁsaddā sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena pavattanti,
anya-e0803n12:247_4: ‘‘Aggassa dātā medhāvī’’ti ettha hi ‘‘aggassā’’ti ayaṁ saddo yadā kriyāpaṭiggahaṇaṁ paṭicca sampadānatthe pavattati,
anya-e0803n12:247_6: Yadā pana kriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūte sāmiatthe pavattati,
anya-e0803n12:247_8: Evaṁ sabbathāpi vipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hotīti.
anya-e0803n12:247_9: Tathā saddanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘sampadānavacana’’nti tumhehi daḷhaṁ gahitassa mayhaṁsaddassa sāmiatthavasena paṇṇattiyaṁ dassanato vibhattivipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hoteva. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n12:250_2: idampi mayha’’nti kāyati ravatīti mayhakoti vuccati mayhasaddūpapadassa ke re ge saddeti dhātussa vasena.
anya-e0803n12:251_0: Atrāyaṁ padasodhanā – yadi tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddā dhuvaṁ sampadānatthe,
anya-e0803n12:251_2: evaṁ sante lokavohārakusalena sabbaññunā tassa sakuṇassa ‘‘mayhako’’ti paṇṇatti na vattabbā siyā anantogadhasampadānatthattā,
anya-e0803n12:251_3: antogadhasāmyatthattā pana ‘‘mamako’’ icceva paññatti vattabbā siyā.
anya-e0803n12:251_4: Etthapi ‘‘mayhako’’ti idaṁ vibhattivipallāsavasena vuttanti ce? Na,
anya-e0803n12:252_0: Apicettha mayhaṁsaddo sarūpato vibhatyantabhāvena tiṭṭhati kasaddena ekapadattūpagamanato,
anya-e0803n12:252_1: evaṁ santepi ‘‘mayhako’’ti ayaṁ sakuṇavisesavācako saddo paccattavacanabhāve ṭhitoyeva īsakaṁ sāmiatthampi jotayati sujampati rājapurisasaddā viya.
anya-e0803n12:252_2: Imināpi kāraṇena vibhattivipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0803n12:252_3: Iti ‘‘mayhako’’ti paṇṇattiyaṁ vattamānassa padāvayavabhūtassa mayhasaddassa avipallāsavacanalesena tuyhaṁ tava mamasaddesupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabboti siddhaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:252_4: Tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyehi sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena pavattānampi samānānaṁ tuyhaṁ mayhaṁ tava mamasaddānaṁ saddanayaññeva nissāya paresamanukampāya vuttappakāro niyamo dassitoti avagantabbaṁ. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0803n12:255_0: Evaṁ santepi etesaṁ, niyamo natthi pāḷiyaṁ;
anya-e0803n12:256_0: Koci tesaṁ viseso ca, diṭṭho amhehi taṁ suṇa.
anya-e0803n12:258_0: ‘‘Tuyhaṁ mayha’’ntime saddā, te payogā na dullabhā.
anya-e0803n12:260_0: Sampadāne yahiṁ honti, te payogā panappakā.
anya-e0803n12:263_0: Sabbāpi imā nītiyo paramasukhumā sududdasā vīrajātinā sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0803n12:264_1: ‘‘Kacci vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā’’tiādīsu hi paccatte dissati.
anya-e0803n12:264_6: ‘‘Ye hi voariyā parisuddhā kāyakammantā’’tiādīsu padapūraṇamatte. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n12:268_1: Ayañhi ‘‘gāmaṁ no gaccheyyāmā’’ti ettha paccatte dissati. ‘‘Mā no ajja vikantiṁsu,
anya-e0803n12:268_2: rañño sūdā mahānase’’tiādīsu upayoge. ‘‘Na no vivāho nāgehi,
anya-e0803n12:268_6: ‘‘Na no samaṁ atthi tathāgatenā’’ti ettha avadhāraṇe.
anya-e0803n12:268_7: ‘‘Abhijānāsi no tvaṁ mahārājā’’tiādīsu nusaddatthe, pucchāyantipi vattuṁ vaṭṭati. ‘‘Subhāsitaññeva bhāseyya,
anya-e0803n12:268_9: ‘‘Na no sabhāyaṁ na karonti kiñcī’’tiādīsu nipātamatte. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n12:272_0: Idāni sabbanāmānaṁ yathārahaṁ saṁkhittena missakapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n12:273_0: Yo so, ye te. Yaṁ taṁ, ye te. Yena tena. Sesaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ. Yā sā, yā tā. Yaṁ taṁ, yā tā. Yāya tāya. Sesaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ. Yaṁ taṁ, yāni tāni. Sesaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:274_0: ‘‘Eso so, ete te. Ayaṁ so, ime te.
anya-e0803n12:274_1: So ayaṁ te ime’’tiādinā yathāpayogaṁ padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:274_2: Tathā hi ‘‘yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako.
anya-e0803n12:274_3: Ete te bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
anya-e0803n12:274_4: Ayaṁ so sārathi etī’’ti evamādayo vicittappayogā dissanti.
anya-e0803n12:281_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
